#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define D 1000000007
#define gcd __gcd
#define getcx getchar
#define pc putchar
#define get(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define getl(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define print(x) printf("%d\n",x)
#define printl(x) printf("%lld\n",x)
#define bitcount __builtin_popcount
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int to(char c)
{
    if(c=='+')
        return 1;
    else
        return -1;
}
int main()
{
    int t; get(t);
    while(t--)
    {
        int n,ans=0; get(n);
        map <string,int> mp; string s; char c;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin >> s >> c;
            if(mp[s]!=0)
            {
                if(mp[s]==-1)
                    ans += 1 + to(c);
                else
                    ans += -1 + to(c);
            }
            else
                ans += to(c);
            mp[s] = to(c);
        }
        print(ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
